com.esri.mo2.data.feat
Interface FeatureClass

All Superinterfaces:
Dataset, GeoDataset, MapDataset, Searchable, Selectable, Table
All Known Subinterfaces:
RemoteFeatureClass
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseFeatureClass, ShapefileFeatureClass
public interface FeatureClass
extends Table, MapDataset

Implements a FeatureClass, which is a kind of Table Dataset that manages and retrieves one type of Feature Data from its datasource.

See Also:
Feature
